Package org.apache.cassandra.metrics

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MetricNameFactory  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CacheMetrics
    Metrics for ICache.
    ClientMetrics  
    ClientRequestMetrics  
    ColumnFamilyMetrics
    Metrics for ColumnFamilyStore.
    CommitLogMetrics
    Metrics for commit log
    CompactionMetrics
    Metrics for compaction.
    ConnectionMetrics
    Metrics for OutboundTcpConnectionPool.
    DefaultNameFactory
    MetricNameFactory that generates default MetricName of metrics.
    DroppedMessageMetrics
    Metrics for dropped messages by verb.
    FileCacheMetrics  
    HintedHandoffMetrics
    Metrics for HintedHandOffManager.
    LatencyMetrics
    Metrics about latencies
    ReadRepairMetrics
    Metrics related to Read Repair.
    RestorableMeter
    A meter metric which measures mean throughput as well as fifteen-minute and two-hour exponentially-weighted moving average throughputs.
    StorageMetrics
    Metrics related to Storage.
    StreamingMetrics
    Metrics for streaming.
    ThreadPoolMetrics
    Metrics for ThreadPoolExecutor.
